top10_tweets_like: Can you believe this coin was rendered entirely in #rstats? In under 10 lines of code? And you can install the package that rendered this (#rayrender) in a single line of code, without worrying about complex build processes or installing requirements manually? https://t.co/JRlxTbRykO

This brilliant new book on #Rstats for #Political #DataScience from @FranciscoUrdin and @arcruz0 is in production and will publish later this year from @CRC_MathStats . https://t.co/CcdH2HzDvV #politicalscience #statistics https://t.co/G4kPfgXoCX

Interesting in calculating diversity values through Hill numbers? Check out the latest version of `hillR` #rstats package. The phylogenetic diversity calculations are much faster in this version. https://t.co/JgbpWLp4PW https://t.co/RJi9q3Kt5P

The new #rstats #json parser by @knapply_  is a beast

https://t.co/UwCz4Vpfjb https://t.co/9OQosFsXul
